dataList.content: Cüce sürüsünü yendikten sonra...
Don Quixote ve Heathcliff herkesin önünde dizlerine çöktüler.
Onlarla birlikte olmam gerektiğini düşünerek, ben de eğildim... ama Outis sıkıca beni kenara çekti.
<Mm... I feel bad for those two.>
... I am ready... Commence, Lady Outis...
Sizi aptallar... Bunun iyi biteceğini nasıl düşündünüz?
İdari Müdürün buraya gelerek üzerine ne kadar çok risk aldığından haberiniz var mı? İkiniz hakkında ne kadar endişelendiğinden?!
Well, actually, Clockhead was in on it from the sta—
Kes lan sesini!
İdari Müdüre sakın öyle terbiyesizce seslenme! Küstah soytarı seni!
Heeaugh! 'Twas mine fault! 'Twas mine fault!
Annem küçüklüğümde beni böyle azarlardı.
Outis'in katı azarlamaları bitmeyecek gibiydi...
Ve ikili kafaları asık bir şekilde sessizliğe bürünmüştü.
... Bu manzaradan uzaklaşmaya karar verdim. This guilty conscience was too much for me to bear.
<... Is Crayon doing okay...?>
Yes. She merely lost her consciousness from exposure to excessive degree of psychological shock.
How did you find yourself at a place such as this?
Sen... insansın, değil mi? Ve biz harbiden de arka sokaklardayız?
Crayon başlangıçta ona gelen soru yağmuru karşısında biraz ürkmüş görünüyordu. Ama sonrasında açıldı.
Demek... harbiden şehirdensiniz.
Ben Bulut Kasabası'ndanım. Arka sokakların kuzeyinde olan bir köy.
Dışarıda... konuşabilen şu cüceler gibi canavarlar çok var mı?
Evet. Cüceler dışı çok canavar var. Birkaçını ben kendi gözlerimle gördüm, ama... diğerilerini köyün büyükleri bana anlattı.
Köyümüz canavarları dışarıda tutmak için yapıldı. Bizi korumak için.
Eğer bu yaşanmasaydı... şuan köyde akşam yemeğini hazırlıyor olurduk...
Demek köyünüzü yağmaladılar.
Evet... ve Avcılar yok iken bize saldırdılar. O yüzden...
Yılın bu zamanlarında onlar tarafından yağmalanmayız, bu yüzden güvende olduğumuzu düşünmüştüm... Ama birden bire, kızaklarıyla içeriye girerek bize saldırdılar...
Bazılarımız savaşmayı denedi, ama hiç şansımız yoktu. Ve... öldürdükleri herkes... o kızaktaki çuvallara sokuldu.
Korkudan bayıldım... ve benim de ölü olduğumu düşündüler. Diğer köylüler gibi çuvala sokuldum.
Oh... We forced you to talk about something that couldn't have been easy to go through. I'm sorry.
N-no, it's okay... Can I... ask things, too?
Anything.
Is it right that crayon boxes in the City have 48 different colors? And they have gold and silver colored crayons, too?
Um... Probably...
And...
... there's just people in the City, right? No... monsters like the gnomes that try to kill us, right?
Hmm... It's kinda hard to answer that, actually.
Sometimes, I'd climb a high hill to look at the City. I always saw pretty, colorful lights from up there... So colorful that I don't have enough colors in my crayon box to draw them all.
I wish I could live in the City. If I lived there, I'd never have to worry about getting attacked by monsters. I could live happily with all my neighbors...
... You've really never been to the City, huh.
S.S.E.
I'm sorry...?
Same story everywhere. Doesn't matter where you are. Death always stalks us.
Woah... that was so cool! Can you say that again?
<Huh? That was cool...?>
... Oh! Uh, did you guys see anyone else nearby, by any chance?
I don't think we ran into any other humans out here.
No... But he has to be here to save us...
Who do you mean?
The best Hunter of Cloud Town... If he was at the village, the gnomes wouldn't have...
It appears that, in the Outskirts, there are 'Hunters' who specialize in hunting monsters. Akin to Whalers of the Great Lake, that is.
But... Wait.
So if they're kidnapping and killing humans for these gifts...
... Who are these gifts for?
HO! HO! HO!
Of course, the gifts are for our poor and kind neighbors who do not cry!
Executive Manager! Retreat!
I don't know when it happened... but a large shadow was looming over us.
Augh! What is that thing?!
I am Santata, bringer of gifts to our neighbors! HO! HO! HO!
The guffawing giant, garbed in red, carried a massive gift sack on his shoulder.
It was definitely not a human.
Yeah! It's that git! That one's the boss!
Lo! The crimson garb! That is the crimson garb that I spoke of!
The pair immediately jumped up from their knees and began shouting in unison.
That's the Red Sack's outfit? Oi, then he's already...
N-no! Not the Reindeer-man, too!
Shut it! Cut the useless chatter, for once...
After silencing the pair with a short, stern command, Outis approached me and spoke in a low voice.
Executive Manager. Since he appears to be of an intelligent species, I will attempt to parlay with it. ... But we best prepare for battle in case the talks fall through.
<... Yeah, that's a good idea.>
What do you mean by neighbors...? Wings? Clients from the City?
HO! HO! HO! But we are denied entry to the City, are we not?
Is that big lump of meat a gnome, too...?
I happened to overhear the gnomes during our time in captivity... They call their master 'Beard Giant', which I believe is not a gnome.
A giant...? There really are all kinds of monsters out here, huh.
Dante, that's not an Abnormality, is it?
<No. That's not an Abnormality or a Distortion. I'd say it's closer to the Whales...>
HO! HO! Do you yearn for gifts, too? Yet your kind already owns all there is to own!
We and our neighbors in the Outskirts wish so dearly for that very day. The only day we are allowed joy and comfort in human gifts.
I see. You produce toys out of humans and gift them to those who harbor hatred for humans.
Out of the pure goodness of your heart.
Here, where all those who have been marginalized and exiled by humans gather and wallow...
... we pour our infinite hatred and care into packaging these gifts. HO! HO! HO!
Quite the verbose way of saying 'I refuse to negotiate'.
HO! HO! HO! Why don't you come here and join us, become joy to those who need it?
